//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "first_scout", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );

	task ( "patrol1" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "scout_patrol_b" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "scout_patrol_a" );
	}

	dowait ( "patrol1" );
}
